comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: Another absolutely wonderful pic! Also a good shot of the William Bede Dalley statue in situ. I've just realised that there's another good pic of the statue at acms.sl.nsw.gov.au/item/itemLarge.aspx?itemID=413719 ; Dalley's ADB entry is at adb.anu.edu.au/biography/dalley-william-bede-3356 ; I love the seat 'reserved for ladies' (!)
